author: Carlos Eucario
comment: Great app for personal finance.

author: CREATIVE COMPUTER
comment: Please update it to take auto backup on Google drive please

author: A Google User
comment: I had exported my data in CSV format but when I try to import it, I am getting error that CSV file is corrupted. I am not able to import my 2 years data.  Please do something about it. Otherwise its simple and neat application. Giving 3 star due to this issue only.     Updates (7-Nov-17): I wish it has option for repeat expenses. I need to move to other app due to this missing feature.  Please add repeat expenses feature and improve export and import even if its paid.  Updates (10-Nov-17): Thanks a lot for response. Now i can say its perfect and simple app. Hats off to the team for developing such a useful app that too without any adds.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Yes, repeat expense is already supported.  On the main screen, tap on the "repeat" button at the right side of the numeric keypad to set repeating options.

author: Mike Liang
comment: Love it! Clean, simple, and easy to use. I use tags to simulate accounts now (like Cash, Credit, etc) would be nice if Accounts could be more formally supported. This way I don't have to check new tag/uncheck old tag when marking the expense account

author: Chandrakant Patel
comment: Excellent.... I use this application for last three years.... It's really fantastic and much helpful too

author: Kamen Lilov
comment: Great app, no bloat at all.

author: Susan Molnar
comment: Use it to track my "free spending" allowance we budget each month. I enter my monthly allowance amount, then enter everything I spend from my allowance.  Hello Expense calculates my balance, so when I'm out shopping, I always know exactly how much I can spend. As a bonus, I always have a record of what I have bought, what I paid, and when I bought it. I set up another account to track sales income and expenditures from my photography business so I can accurately report income to the IRS. Easy. Accurate. Convenient.

author: Midgely Radim
comment: Fantastic app. Very useful for tracking expenses and comes with some handy graphs to visualize the date. On top of that you can export the data to make use in other accounting software, like GNUcash for example.

author: A Google User
comment: Just switched phones and all my info came over just fantastic.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Thanks for confirming that Google auto backup is indeed working!

author: A Google User
comment: Its an easy to use, very simple and complete expense manager application, really loving it! Love the added Google Drive backup

author: ranjit shyam
comment: My primary use for this app is to record transactions that occur on a daily basis, and then export them via email at the end of the the month.  It works better than any other applications that I have tried for that purpose.

author: Sudipta Mallick
comment: The app is superb... Kudos to the developer. Just to draw your attention, I would like to tell you a small bug. When year view is selected if you select and hold two years, then the options come for comparing. However, in the comparison window different​ year gets selected with all wrong data. Also, it would be great if the the second to first tag merging feature is available. Since second tag is deprecated now, so this feature will help old user tracked using second tag will come in search result now. Please provide  some guide for using developer options.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback.  I wasn't able to reproduce the year comparison bug because the data looks correct to me.  May be there are some case that I'm not aware of.  As for the second tag feature, I'll provide an option to merge it to the first tag in the future version.

author: Thomas S
comment: Great app for tracking your expenses in multiple currencies. Simple, fast and easy to use ... very useful. Keep up the good work!! If i could i qould add anothet 1 or 2 other stars. New feature to sync data via bluetooth is simple and fast and pain free... simply put awesome app that will actually make your life easier.
I've been using this app for years and it's perfect. Simple, clean, easy to use and actually ad-free! The developer has kept it donation-based all this time, which is amazing. Thanks Alan L!

author: DCM DCM
comment: Simple and easy. No fancy stuff.

author: Conrad Chang
comment: Excellent. Have been using this for years. One question, what happen to the android wear app. I cannot find it anymore.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Hi Conrad, the wear app has been removed in the latest version due to low usage and poor usability.

author: Willy Yant
comment: Thank you for fix my problem. Love your apps!

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Hi Willy, I am not able to reproduce this problem. This may be happening only on specific devices so can you send a screenshot to helloapps1@gmail.com?  Thanks!

author: Shi Hui Tee
comment: I am back to andriod phones just for this app! Thanks for creating this.

author: Leonard Frankel
comment: Outstanding. Very useful, and easy to use. ****original 4 star review (outdated. They fixed it!): Good, But Would Be Better If It Didn't Capitalise Every Word In The Sentence. That's Kind Of Annoying. Would Like An Option To Switch That Off.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: This has been fixed in 7.2. Thanks for your suggestion.

author: Rushabh Sanjay
comment: For increasing the user base and enlarging the customer experience, the app manufactures could think of making a *private diary* app. So that people could hand in hand write their daily diary and expenses together. Thank You!

author: José Vasconcelos
comment: Excellent app, reliable and effective, does what is intended for. Suggestion: add a link to today in the calendar view.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: You can long press the date itself to reset to today's date.  Thanks for using the app.

author: Prasad A.V.S.
comment: Wish it had an option to not display currency. Does not have rupee symbol...and probably tons of others missing. No need for any symbol really. Otherwise it's excellent, simple, gets the job done. Will try it, but just that one currency issue makes it unusable. Imagine using a pound symbol for all your expenses because the dollar sign (or none) is not available.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Hi Prasad, the app supports adding any custom currency in Settings > Currencies. Thanks for using the app.

title: Very nice!....but.

author: Weldon Young
comment: Once you get your catagories setup and have entered a database of expense notes - HELLO EXPENSE require a minimum number of key strokes to get the task done. It also has fairly large text for easy recognition and use on mobile devices.
title: SUPER FAST & EFFICIENT EXPENSE TRACKER

author: Jenn Jones
comment: Great app! Simple, easy to use. Pretty much does everything I need it to do.  The only thing I wish it had was an option to  calculate category totals biweekly. Other than that, I love it!
title: Great app!

comment: I have tried at least 5 other cash book app. But at the end i settle for this one. Very user friendly. Clean layout. Exporting to Excel is easy. Good search function. One suggestion, on the Export page if you could choose up to date that would be just great. Thanks to the team for a great App.
title: One of the best app

author: David Nicholls
comment: I spent hours trawling through apps looking for an expense manager - none met my needs till Hello Expense - I love the GUI and logical flow - very well thought out and after a short learning curve simple to use - Top Work - Donation to follow !      One feature request - 10 stars (+ cup of coffee !)  if I can view the next recurring expense so I can have the option of paying early - the reason is I get paid 4 weekly but some expenses are due on a given day each month so I pay off all that are due before the next payday then I know what is left.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Thanks for the comments!  There is no plan to support attaching receipt photo because it slows down data entry.  For now, please use the camera app to take pictures separately.

title: Flawless

author: Lovelyn Ace
comment: Have been using it for a long time and loving it to bits. However, is it possible to add in an additional account function? I'll love to keep track of my personal and household expenses without using yet another tag. Cheers for the job well done! 😁

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Currently there is no plan for adding multi-account support because it is an advanced feature.  Please use tag for now.  Thanks for the comment!

title: Excellent app

author: Cesar Meza
comment: I am now constantly worried about my expenses. The wife hates this. 5/5
title: Pretty good

author: Truc Nguyen
comment: Everything is pretty easy to use: adding entries, setting up categories, viewing year/month expenses in total and per category. Wish there was a function to view expenses in a specified period, e.g. 15/XY - 15XZ to see how much of my monthly pay was spent in that period.
title: Easy to use and great functions

author: Om Prakash Purohit
comment: App is nice...but following things can be added: 1. Provide Add Category in category field only.2. Provide symbol to all categories.3. change name of tag to notes.
title: Good App but

author: Ann Doerffel
comment: I use this app to track expenses for many of my activities that I'm involved in.  I gave it a 5 star rating.
title: Hello Expense

author: Linda Pichanusakorn
comment: It was a wonderful app...thks to you. I just bought a Samsung Tab S2, and I want to transfer the info from my Samsung note 3 to my Tab. How do i do? I want this app to be used on both of the phone & the tab. I use smart switch for my contacts, photos but not this app. Pls advise.

author: Izham Ajmaan
comment: Just a suggestion, you might want to include an option to capture and save picture for each record. eg, receipts
title: Very easy to use

author: Akash Aggarwal
comment: This is the best app for tracking expenses. Tags feature is what gives an edge. I use tags to represent the card I use to make the payments and it becomes quite easy to check and balance credit card statements. Thank You.

author: Joel Lim
comment: After importing, my entries are all jumbled up and I have entries for 2018!

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: Please ensure that the date format and the date in the import file matches. For example, if the date format is DD-MM-YYYY, the date in the import file should be 31-12-2016.

title: Now I have entries for 2018!

author: Rajesh Soni
comment: Multiplication symbol not visible in calculator Rectified in next update

author: Jason K
comment: So that users can switch between phones without worrying about the app data.

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: This feature is already supported. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Auto backup to Google drive

author: Leonid Aldert Maarssen
comment: I am a longtime user of this app and am fully satisfied with it. I give it a five-star rating.
title: Hello Expense

author: Teddy Halim
comment: Sorry did not carefully check..

reply.author: Alan L
reply.content: You can add currencies by going to the settings menu.  Thanks for using the app.

title: Currency done

author: Mai Linh Phan
comment: Easy to use, best customize. Thanks. However, i would love it more if it could be designed for couple ^^
title: Good for a simple recording
